TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataObjectEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class for events associated with the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelCommand() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancels the associated command or operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CommandCancelled%2A> property to `true`. After an event has been canceled, it cannot be reactivated.
If this method is called on a drag-and-drop operation (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.IsDragDrop%2A> property), the entire drag-and-drop operation is canceled.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the associated command or operation has been canceled.
Docs.value: if the command has been canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Call the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A> method to set this property to `true` and cancel the associated command or operation.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation.
Docs.value: if the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Copying> event is raised when dragging is initiated and the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event is raised when the selection is dropped.
